amendment.description: Amendment prevents Federal websites from using Internet software, commonly referred to as "cookies", to collect information about website users/visitors.
amendment.purpose: An amendment numbered 6 printed in the Congressional Record to prevent Federal websites from using Internet software, commonly referred to as "cookies", to collect information about website users/visitors.

vote.text: On agreeing to the Frelinghuysen amendment (A011) Agreed to by voice vote.
